name: Color Me Stoked
description:
INTRODUCTION

Color Me Stoked is a simple puzzle game where you mix primary colors to get secondary  colors, those that are toxic for the direct touch. With those colors, you can shoot at DOORS or ORBS to open them, proceding to the next levels.

CONTROLS

Arrows / WASD to move.

Space to jump.

Click to shoot.

GAME IN DEVELOPMENT

Only 3 testing levels are available right now.
